description: Dashboard for tendermint, go prometheus metrics exported via the cosmos-sdk.

panels.description: Resident and Virtual memory size in bytes
panels.title: Memory Utilization

panels.description: Number of goroutines that currently exist
panels.title: Total Goroutines

panels.description: Number of bytes used for other system allocations
panels.title: Other Run Time Allocations Memory Usage

panels.description: Number of peers node is connected to
panels.title: Total Peers

panels.description: Number of bytes per channel received from a given peer
panels.title: Peer Network Input

panels.description: Number of bytes per channel sent to a given peer
panels.title: Peer Network Output

panels.description: Number of pending bytes to be sent to a given peer
panels.title: Peer Network Output - Pending

panels.description: Difference in seconds between the proposal timestamp and the timestamp of the latest prevote that achieved a quorum in the prevote step
panels.title: Prevote Message Delay

panels.description: Number of transactions rechecked in the mempool
panels.title: Mempool Recheck Times

panels.description: Sum of blockparts transmitted by peer in 5m timeframe
panels.title: Consensus Block Parts

title: Cosmos Node Monitoring from NeoBase
